targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s)  *-1 FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$wan_interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$wan_interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s)  *-1 FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$wan_interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$wan_interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "scur" FROM "autogen"."haproxy" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "proxy"
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s)  *-1 FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$wan_interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$wan_interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s)  *-1 FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$wan_interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$wan_interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
